message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.NA, cs.CC

Reasoning: 
- cs.IT (Information Theory) is the most likely category as the paper deals with coding theory and optimal-bandwidth repair.
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper discusses the sub-packetization level of the code and its storage overhead.
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is relevant as the paper deals with cooperative regenerating codes, which are used in distributed storage systems.
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) is relevant as the paper may involve numerical computations and optimization.
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is less likely but still possible as the paper may involve analyzing the complexity of the proposed construction.
